ygData.subject: Re: Level 9 huh?
ygData.msgSnippet: You sell them to merchants or other players. Depending on your charisma score, race and faction, you can get a platinum for them. For instance, if you re a
ygData.messageBody:
You sell them to merchants or other players. Depending on your
charisma score, race and faction, you can get a platinum for them.
For instance, if you're a wodd elf, odds are Linadian in West FP
will give you better prices than anyone else. Don't sell to Boomba
the Big unless you have to, he will rip you off, he gives around
half what the others give. The same is tru for the merchant at the
top of the orc lift in Kelethin and the merchant right outside of
Befallen.

--- In theeverquesttavern@y..., nathans <no_reply@y...> wrote:
> Where can you turn in these rings for a plat piece?
>
>
> --- In theeverquesttavern@y..., namoohs wrote:
> > I agree with the post for the most part except
> > for one addition. I'd say you probably want to level
> > 12 and 13 through the NRO area using derv groups.
> > They drop some +2 dex rings than sometimes can sell
> > for a plat piece and make for a good low level ring
> > to wear. Plus they're good experience and make for
> > interesting group experience. It's a good place to meet
> > people before moving on to a much more hectic and faster
> > paced Oasis zone.<br><br>shooman out
